sqlMap.select: select * ,(select max(gpstime) from bus_gps where refno = t.gpsidno) AS recenttime ,(select count(*) from bus_gps where refno = t.gpsidno) AS totaldata FROM bus_gps_ref t WHERE $qry$ ORDER BY gpsidno LIMIT $limit$ OFFSET $start$
select count(*) AS counts FROM bus_gps_ref t WHERE $qry$
select * FROM bus_gps t WHERE $qry$ $filter$ ORDER BY refno , gpstime DESC LIMIT $limit$ OFFSET $start$
select count(*) AS counts FROM bus_gps t WHERE $qry$ $filter$
